name: First Sin
description:
While cultivating all kinds of skills, regain lost memories! !

While cultivating all kinds of skills, regain lost memories! !

■ Play time
around 10 hours

■ Game introduction text

On a certain beach, a young man got up.
The young man has lost his memory and cannot remember his identity, including his name.
Barely, from the things in the box that had been washed up nearby
once wielded a spear,
that his name is Sigurd (name can be changed)
I remember, right after that, I heard a scream from somewhere...!

■ Game Features

・Since we have adopted a skill proficiency system
You can develop your skills as well as the players themselves.
There are many ways to develop skills.
The easiest thing is to use the skills you want to raise.
Since the power of skills increases almost endlessly,
If you train thoroughly, it's no longer a dream to defeat the boss with a single blow! ?
・In this work, if you equip accessories and defeat enemies,
You can use the effects of decorations as your own power.
It's called a passive skill.
Equipped with passive skills and raised skills
Face your enemies.
・ During battle, allies and enemies move with dialogue
It will make the side view battle gorgeous.
・The field map is drawn in 3D.
We have also made some changes to the appearance of the menu screen and battle screen.
